summary: A utility that automates acquisition and preparation of the Huiji ACG text‑to‑speech dataset: it downloads the source archive, extracts the audio and transcript files, cleans and normalizes the text, and outputs structured JSON metadata ready for training speech synthesis models.
business_intent: To streamline the creation of a high‑quality TTS training corpus from Huiji ACG content, reducing manual effort and ensuring consistent data formatting for downstream speech synthesis applications.
